sys_script_include.description: Returns an array of table names that contain "base" tables. "Base" tables are tables which serve only as base tables for more specific record tables. E.g., the "sys_hub_flow_block" is a base table from which e.g. "sys_hub_flow" is derived.
sys_script_include.name: GetBaseRecordTables

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_cc68119683465a1000d5ccc0deaad3c3
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_ride.GetBaseRecordTables</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Returns an array of table names that contain "base" tables. "Base" tables are tables which serve only as base tables for more specific record tables.
E.g., the "sys_hub_flow_block" is a base table from which e.g. "sys_hub_flow" is derived.</description><name>GetBaseRecordTables</name><script><![CDATA[function GetBaseRecordTables()
{
	var aBaseRecordTables = [
		'sys_hub_flow_block',
		'sys_hub_flow_base',
		'sys_hub_action_type_base'
		];
	return aBaseRecordTables;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-11-25 16:56:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>cc68119683465a1000d5ccc0deaad3c3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetBaseRecordTables</sys_name><sys_package display_value="R-IDE WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_ide">b598b2161b2e2510cd6153d16b4bcb08</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="R-IDE WORK IN PROGRESS">b598b2161b2e2510cd6153d16b4bcb08</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_cc68119683465a1000d5ccc0deaad3c3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-12-08 00:03:52</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
